<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"DELETE /admin/keys/:kid"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/admin/keys/{kid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Revoke a retiring key (remove from JWKS).
Only retiring keys can be revoked; active keys must be rotated first.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
